description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fstqm","text":"Kanamycin is an aminoglycoside antibiotic which binds the 30S ribosomal subunit; causes mis-translation. It is used for the selection of cells containing Kanamycin-resistant plasmids on plates and on liquid media at a working concentration of 50-100 µg/mL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24rbt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44vca","text":"It is most often prepared as a 1000x working stock of 50 -100 mg/mL that is stored at -20 ºC. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"702s8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"110df","text":"The kanamycin solution is measured and then mixed into a container of liquid or plate media before it has solidified. Cells are then streaked onto the plates or grown in the liquid media. Only cells containing the plasmids resistant to kanamycin will grow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ari4d","text":"Clean work surfaces and work space using freshly prepared   bleach, followed by   alcohol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fn8nq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"ED1D5CB0C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"EF5A2D50C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rcq7","text":"Using the electronic balance, carefully weigh out   of kanamycin sulphate powder (CAS#: 70560-51-9; Linear Formula: C18H36-37N4-5O10-11 · H2SO4) into an appropriate size weighing boat using a spatula. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":117,"length":2},{"style":"sub","offset":120,"length":5},{"style":"sub","offset":126,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":130,"length":5},{"style":"sub","offset":139,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":142,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fjfr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iuss","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6376i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.4","error":false,"guid":"A8F9D1D0C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":3,"offset":45}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1vc2r","text":"Kanamycin sulphate is a hazardous substance (SDS) and may damage fertility or the unborn child. It is highly recommended to weigh out all antibiotics in a fume hood or powder weighing station.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"F3E60190C24211EC85762929E248AE70","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/sds/sigma/60615"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arrta","text":"Carefully tip the powder into a sterile   centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jqfq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BC302F60C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0qju","text":"Using a   measuring cylinder, measure out   of sterile distilled or deionised water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1n5sk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"C3EA7CB0C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"C58FC840C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"es7p9","text":"Pour   water into the   centrifuge tube containing the kanamycin powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aopo8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"CB4EBAC0C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D2034538C24111EC89480A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1dg0","text":"Use the remaining   to rinse the weighing boat and pouring that into the   falcon tube to make   total and mix gently by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5kieb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"D74D1A60C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"E21A7410C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"E3E43790C24111EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vuut","text":"Using the sterile  syringe, aspirate the solution from the falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"et1c2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"0FEA5BD0C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hf68","text":"Affix a sterile 0.22 µm micro filter to the end of the syringe and dispense thee solution into a new sterile    centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"283F7305C24211EC89480A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bb7rc","text":"Pipette   of the filtered   Kanamycin solution into 4 x sterile   microcentrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ms8s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"2FE0E260C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"32A7CA90C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"4143DF80C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a806","text":"Close the tubes, label and store them at  if they are not to be used immediately. This is a 1000x stock of   Kanamycin which is the normal working concentration in liquid or solid media. The stock can be diluted before use to reach the desired concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8qn60","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"capd3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29uqq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpdag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qub9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"439D11C0C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"8A60EA00C24211EC85762929E248AE70","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"au9n9","text":"Kanamycin sulphate does degrade with time and there can be differences in potency and stability between batches. It is recommended when starting with a new batch to titrate the concentration to ensure 100% of non-resistant bacteria are killed. If the antibiotic properties start to drop off, ideally make a new batch from scratch or titrate to an increased effective concentration.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Preparation of 100mg/ml kanamycin solution
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"b934n","text":"Kanamycin sulphate is a hazardous substance (SDS) and may damage fertility or the unborn child. It is highly recommended to weigh out all antibiotics in a fume hood or powder weighing station.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":3}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A742FED0C34F11EC97780A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/sds/sigma/60615"}}}}
